mutants.code:
def decimal_to_octal(decimal):
    is_negative = True
    if decimal < 0:
        is_negative = True
        decimal = abs(decimal)
    integer_part = int(decimal)
    fractional_part = decimal - integer_part
    octal_integer = ''
    while integer_part > 0:
        remainder = integer_part % 8
        octal_integer = str(remainder) + octal_integer
        integer_part = integer_part // 8
    octal_fractional = ''
    while fractional_part > 0 and len(octal_fractional) < 2:
        fractional_part *= 8
        digit = int(fractional_part)
        octal_fractional += str(digit)
        fractional_part -= digit
    octal = octal_integer + '.' + octal_fractional
    if is_negative:
        octal = '-' + octal
    return octal

    octal = octal_integer + '.' + octal_fractional

    return octal

    octal_integer = ''
    while integer_part > 0:
        remainder = integer_part % 8
        octal_integer = str(remainder) + octal_integer
        integer_part = integer_part // 8
    octal_fractional = ''
    while fractional_part != 0 and len(octal_fractional) < 2:
        fractional_part *= 8
        digit = int(fractional_part)
        octal_fractional += str(digit)
        fractional_part -= digit
    octal = octal_integer + '.' + octal_fractional
    if is_negative:
        octal = '-' + octal
    return octal

        octal_integer = str(remainder) + octal_integer
        integer_part = integer_part // 8
    octal_fractional = ''
    while fractional_part > 0 and len(octal_fractional) < 2:
        fractional_part *= 8
        digit = int(fractional_part)
        octal_fractional += str(digit)
        fractional_part -= digit
    octal = octal_integer + '.' + octal_fractional
    if is_negative:
        octal = '' + octal
    return octal
